actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to prevent reductions in supplemental security income benefits because of social security benefit increases.

summary.text: Revises the Social Security Act by preventing reductions in supplemental security income benefits because of social security benefit increases.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to prevent reductions in supplemental security income benefits because of social security benefit increases.
